name: SQuAD 2.0
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
An expanded version of SQuAD featuring over 150k questions, including 50k unanswerable ones crafted to resemble answerable questions.
size: Approximately 152,500 Q&A pairs (including unanswerable); ~54 MB JSON.
notes: Includes unanswerable questions requiring models to predict a special null response. The leaderboard evaluates combined accuracy on answerable and unanswerable questions.
